title: Centre Avenue YMCA enrollment workers seated from left: Dorcas Turner, Lucile Wyant, J. D. Lewis, Sarah Robinson, Velva Boea; second row: William H. Coleman, Jesse E. Bolden Jr., Frank Lavelle, John Young, Paul E. Thompson, Laurence Washington, Robert Nicholas; third row: Beverly H. Hunt Sr., Andrew Frazier, Frank E. Bolden Jr., William Albea, William A. Arvin, Rev. James B. Cayce, Atty. Byrd R. Brown, and John H. Boykin Sr. posed under Henry O.Tanner painting "Christ and His Mother" in YMCA
